      public void boostPointsInStore(int playerNumber, int points)
      increases the number of stones in the provided players store
      Parameters:
      points - : the amount of points to add to the provided player
      playerNumber - : the number of the player for which to increase points

    • usePowerUp

      public void usePowerUp(PowerUp powerUp, int userNumber)

      Parameters:
      powerUp - : the power up we want to mark as used
      userNumber - : the number of the player for which to use the power up

    • getPowerUpStatus

      public boolean getPowerUpStatus(PowerUp powerUp, int userNumber)
      checks to see if a specific power up has been used or not

      userNumber - : the number of the player for which to check
